name: Fact or Fiction (Clyde Team)
description:
Description

Fact or Fiction is a great Trivia Game to play with friends or family. Watch each other's intelligence drop as they are met with simple True or False questions. 

Fact or Fiction is a simple true or false game that allows players to put their random knowledge to the test in an attempt to get the highest score.

Credits

Developed by: Clyde Team

Game Dev: Jaywade

Artist: Jaspic
